My Kitty (Re-post)

By Celious on Thursday, April 27, 2000 - 09:00 pm:

Help my kitty!
I keep trying to feed him cup jelly and potato which are supposedly kittys favorite foods but his paws wont open the jelly or cut the potato! And when i try to send him on errantry he claws me! He always wants to rest, and i can't get him to not be truant on any drills.. I tried manually to make him learn twiddle but his neck snapped! Help me!

-- What's a PSX? (newbie@new.com), January 02, 2000

By Celious on Thursday, April 27, 2000 - 09:01 pm:

Well some infants are rebelious at first just be patient. Oh and NEVER FEED THEM POTATOES! NEVER! It causes stress. even if they like them!
